title: Mafioso's Guard Dog

fields.name: **feline Rivalry** (passive):
fields.value: The first time you visit any player with a Cat-themed role or receive any player with a Cat-themed role in your Light Sleeper results, you will automatically attack them in addition to any other ability used. This ability ignores investigative modifiers.

desc:
Post 41
***Light Sleeper** (Passive)*
You will learn the identity of a number (based on your score) of players visiting Mafia members each night. 0-50% = 1, 51-65% = 2, 65-80% = 3, 80%+ = 4.
***Protective Behavior** (Passive)*
Each night you will attack one random player attempting to attack a Mafia member. Their attack will fail, but if they outplaced you they will attack you instead.
***Track Scent** (1x, Charge 60%)*
Target a player. You will learn who they visited last night and who they visit tonight.
***Sic 'em!** (1x, Locked)*
Attack a player who appeared in your last Light Sleeper results.
